<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_business_rules">
    <x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_business_rules action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <abort_action>false</abort_action>
        <access>package_private</access>
        <action_delete>false</action_delete>
        <action_insert>true</action_insert>
        <action_query>false</action_query>
        <action_update>true</action_update>
        <active>true</active>
        <add_message>false</add_message>
        <advanced>true</advanced>
        <change_fields>false</change_fields>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <collection/>
        <condition>current.status=='pending' && current.process_type=='synchronous'</condition>
        <description/>
        <execute_function>false</execute_function>
        <filter_condition/>
        <is_rest>false</is_rest>
        <message/>
        <name>Push Data Synchronously</name>
        <order>100</order>
        <priority>100</priority>
        <rest_method/>
        <rest_method_text/>
        <rest_service/>
        <rest_service_text/>
        <rest_variables/>
        <role_conditions/>
        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
 current.status = 'work_in_progress';
 var externalSourceGr = current.hr_integration_service_mapping.hr_external_source;
 var hrIntegrationsHelper = new sn_hr_integrations.HRIntegrationsHelper();
 var outboundRequestType = current.hr_integration_service_mapping.outbound_request_type.toString();
 var outboundMessageId="";
 var outboundMessageFunctionId="";
     if(outboundRequestType=="soap"){
   outboundMessageId = current.hr_integration_service_mapping.outbound_service.toString();
   outboundMessageFunctionId = current.hr_integration_service_mapping.outbound_service_function.toString();  
  }else if(outboundRequestType=="rest"){
   outboundMessageId = current.hr_integration_service_mapping.rest_outbound_service.toString();
   outboundMessageFunctionId = current.hr_integration_service_mapping.rest_outbound_service_function.toString();
  }
 var workflowVars = hrIntegrationsHelper.setWorkflowParameters(outboundRequestType,outboundMessageId, outboundMessageFunctionId, null, externalSourceGr, 1, current.hr_integration_service_mapping, current.source_table_name, current.source_table_sys_id);
 
 var inputValuesJson = JSON.parse(workflowVars.input_values);
 inputValuesJson.service_type = "POST";
 inputValuesJson.external_int_id = current.sys_id.toString();
 inputValuesJson.tableName = current.source_table_name.toString();
 inputValuesJson.tableSysId = current.source_table_sys_id.toString();
 workflowVars.input_values = JSON.stringify(inputValuesJson);
 gs.info("Workflow Variables for POST Service " + workflowVars.input_values);
 
 if(!workflowVars.abortAction){
  current.update();
  gs.info("Parameters for Workflow " + workflowVars.input_values + "  " + current.hr_integration_service_mapping.outbound_service_function.toString());
  hrIntegrationsHelper.startWorkflow(workflowVars);
  
 }else{
  var errorMessage = 'Pushing data will stop as the value for mandatory field "'+workflowVars.abortActionErrorMessage+'" is missing (refer to HR Integrations outbound schema mapping for more information).';
  gs.error(errorMessage);
  current.status ='error';
  current.error_message = errorMessage;
  current.update();
 }
 
 
 /*var workflow = new global.Workflow();
 var gr = workflow.startFlow("e7f1074c9f6322003be01050a57fcf6e",null,null,workflowVars);*/

})(current, previous);]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_business_rules</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2024-09-21 07:52:32</sys_created_on>

        <sys_id>387ce05983701210c6695855eeaad31c</sys_id>

        <sys_name>Push Data Synchronously</sys_name>
